 9	/* 1. 全局和主题变量定义 */
 10	:root {
 11	 --ease-out: cubic-bezier(0.25, 1, 0.5, 1);
 12	
 13	 /* 默认 (浅色) 主题 */
 14	 --c-primary: #319795;
 15	 --c-secondary: #6B46C1;

 18	 --c-text-primary: #1A202C;

 21	 --c-highlight-bg: rgba(49, 151, 149, 0.1);
 22	 --c-card-shadow: 0 4px 6px -1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05), 0 2px 4px -2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05);
 23	 --c-card-hover-shadow: 0 10px 15px -3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1), 0 4px 6px -4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
 24	}
 25	
 26	/* 你的 ThemeProvider 会在 html 元素上设置 data-theme="dark" */
 27	[data-theme="dark"] {
 28	 /* 深色主题 */
 29	 --c-primary: #4FD1C5;
 30	 --c-secondary: #9F7AEA;
 31	 --c-background: #1A202C;
 32	 --c-surface: #2D3748;
 33	 --c-text-primary: #F7FAFC;
 34	 --c-text-secondary: #A0AEC0;

 36	 --c-border: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.15);
 37	 --c-highlight-bg: rgba(79, 209, 197, 0.1);
 38	 --c-card-shadow: 0 4px 8px -1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
 39	 --c-card-hover-shadow: 0 10px 20px -3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4);
 40	}
 41	
 42	/* 2. 基础和布局样式 */
 43	.about-page-container {
 44	 background-color: var(--c-background);
 45	 color: var(--c-text-primary);
 46	 font-family: 'Inter', 'Helvetica Neue', 'Arial', sans-serif;
 47	 transition: background-color 0.4s var(--ease-out), color 0.4s var(--ease-out);
 48	 min-height: 100vh;
 49	}
 50	
 51	/* 覆盖 Tailwind 的 container 默认 padding */
 52	.about-page-container .container {
 53	 padding-left: 1.5rem;
 54	 padding-right: 1.5rem;
 55	}
 56	
 57	/* 3. 英雄区域 (Header) */
 58	.about-page-container .hero-gradient {
 59	 padding: 6rem 1rem;
 60	 text-align: center;
 61	 position: relative;
 62	 overflow: hidden;
 63	 background-color: var(--c-surface);
 64	 border-bottom: 1px solid var(--c-border);
 65	 transition: background-color 0.4s var(--ease-out), border-color 0.4s var(--ease-out);
 66	}
 67	.about-page-container .hero-gradient::before {
 68	 content: '';
 69	 position: absolute;
 70	 top: 0; left: 0; right: 0; bottom: 0;
 71	 background: radial-gradient(circle at 10% 20%, var(--c-highlight-bg) 0%, transparent 40%),
 72	 radial-gradient(circle at 90% 80%, var(--c-highlight-bg) 0%, transparent 40%);
 73	 opacity: 0.7;
 74	 animation: pulse 10s infinite alternate ease-in-out;
 75	 z-index: 1;
 76	 transition: background 0.4s var(--ease-out);
 77	}
 78	@keyframes pulse {
 79	 from { transform: scale(1); opacity: 0.6; }
 80	 to { transform: scale(1.2); opacity: 0.8; }
 81	}
 82	
 83	/* 4. 标题和文本样式 */
 84	.about-page-container h1,
 85	.about-page-container h2,
 86	.about-page-container h3 {
 87	 color: var(--c-text-primary);
 88	 font-weight: 700;
 89	 transition: color 0.4s var(--ease-out);
 90	}
 91	.about-page-container h1 {
 92	 font-size: clamp(2.5rem, 5vw, 3.5rem);
 93	 font-weight: 800;
 94	 letter-spacing: -0.025em;
 95	}
 96	.about-page-container h2 {
 97	 font-size: 2.25rem;
 98	 position: relative;
 99	 display: inline-block;
 100	}
 101	.about-page-container h2::after {
 102	 content: '';
 103	 position: absolute;
 104	 left: 50%;
 105	 transform: translateX(-50%);
 106	 bottom: -0.75rem;
 107	 width: 60px;
 108	 height: 4px;
 109	 background: linear-gradient(90deg, var(--c-primary), var(--c-secondary));
 110	 border-radius: 2px;
 111	 transition: background 0.4s var(--ease-out);

 119	/* 5. 卡片样式 (核心美化部分) */
 120	.about-page-container .bg-white,

 123	.about-page-container .cta-card {

 127	 padding: 2rem;
 128	 box-shadow: var(--c-card-shadow);
 129	 transition: transform 0.3s var(--ease-out), box-shadow 0.3s var(--ease-out), border-color 0.3s var(--ease-out), background-color 0.4s var(--ease-out);
 130	 position: relative;
 131	 overflow: hidden;
 132	}

 134	.about-page-container .bg-white:hover,
 135	.about-page-container .feature-card:hover,
 136	.about-page-container .tech-card:hover,
 137	.about-page-container .cta-card:hover {

 142	
 143	/* 愿景卡片文本对齐 */
 144	.about-page-container .bg-white p {

 146	 margin-left: auto;

 154

 163	 transition: all 0.3s var(--ease-out);
 164	}
 165	/* 悬停时图标的父级元素，让图标动起来 */
 166	.about-page-container .feature-card:hover .icon-wrapper,
 167	.about-page-container .cta-card:hover .icon-wrapper {
 168	 transform: scale(1.1) rotate(5deg);
 169	 background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--c-primary), var(--c-secondary));
 170	 color: white;
 171	}
 172	
 173	/* 7. 特定组件样式 */
 174	
 175	/* 开发者卡片内的特性列表 */
 176	.about-page-container .flex.items-center.gap-4 {
 177	 padding: 0.75rem;
 178	 border-radius: 0.75rem;
 179	 transition: background-color 0.2s ease;
 180	}
 181	.about-page-container .flex.items-center.gap-4:hover {
 182	 background-color: var(--c-highlight-bg);
 183	}
 184	
 185	/* 技术栈卡片 */
 186	.about-page-container .tech-card li {
 187	 margin: 0; /* 覆盖 p, li 的默认 margin */
 188	}
 189	
 190	/* CTA (Call to Action) 卡片 */
 191	.about-page-container .cta-card {
 192	 text-decoration: none;
 193	}
 194	.about-page-container .cta-card h3,
 195	.about-page-container .cta-card p {
 196	 color: var(--c-text-primary); /* 确保 CTA 卡片文本颜色正确 */
 197	}
 198	.about-page-container .cta-card p {
 199	 color: var(--c-text-secondary);
 200	}
 201	
 202	
 203	/* 8. 覆盖/协调 Tailwind 类，确保主题生效 */
 204	.about-page-container .dark\\:text-white,
 205	.about-page-container .text-gray-900,
 206	.about-page-container .font-medium {
 207	 color: var(--c-text-primary) !important;
 208	}
 209	
 210	.about-page-container .dark\\:text-gray-200,
 211	.about-page-container .text-gray-700,
 212	.about-page-container .dark\\:text-gray-300,
 213	.about-page-container .text-gray-600,
 214	.about-page-container .text-sm {
 215	 color: var(--c-text-secondary) !important;
 216	}
 217	
 218	.about-page-container .dark\\:bg-gray-800 {
 219	 background-color: var(--c-surface) !important;
 220	}
 221	
 222	.about-page-container .dark\\:border-gray-700,
 223	.about-page-container .border-gray-200 {
 224	 border-color: var(--c-border) !important;
 225	}
 226	
 227	.about-page-container .dark\\:text-primary-400,
 228	.about-page-container .text-primary-600 {
 229	 color: var(--c-primary) !important;
 230	}
 231	
 232	.about-page-container .dark\\:hover\\:bg-gray-700:hover,
 233	.about-page-container .hover\\:bg-gray-50:hover {
 234	 background-color: var(--c-highlight-bg) !important;
 235	}
 236	
 237	.about-page-container .bg-opacity-20 {
 238	 background-color: var(--c-highlight-bg) !important;
 239	}

 155	```text
 156	.

 166	│ └── index.js
 167	├── cypress/ # E2E 测试

 169	│ └── support/

 171	└── docs/

 1	/*
 2	 美化后的 AboutPage.css
 3	 - 使用 CSS 变量实现强大的主题系统
 4	 - 为深色模式添加了符合截图的发光轮廓
 5	 - 重新设计了标题、卡片和图标样式，增加了色彩和动效
 6	 - 优化了布局和对齐，特别是愿景卡片的文本居中

 8	
 9	/* 1. 全局和主题变量定义 */
 10	:root {
 11	 --ease-out: cubic-bezier(0.25, 1, 0.5, 1);
 12	
 13	 /* 默认 (浅色) 主题 */
 14	 --c-primary: #319795;
 15	 --c-secondary: #6B46C1;
 16	 --c-background: #F7FAFC;
 17	 --c-surface: #FFFFFF;
 18	 --c-text-primary: #1A202C;
 19	 --c-text-secondary: #4A5568;
 20	 --c-border: #E2E8F0;
 21	 --c-highlight-bg: rgba(49, 151, 149, 0.1);
 22	 --c-card-shadow: 0 4px 6px -1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05), 0 2px 4px -2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05);
 23	 --c-card-hover-shadow: 0 10px 15px -3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1), 0 4px 6px -4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
 24	}
 25	
 26	/* 你的 ThemeProvider 会在 html 元素上设置 data-theme="dark" */
 27	[data-theme="dark"] {
 28	 /* 深色主题 */
 29	 --c-primary: #4FD1C5;
 30	 --c-secondary: #9F7AEA;
 31	 --c-background: #1A202C;
 32	 --c-surface: #2D3748;
 33	 --c-text-primary: #F7FAFC;
 34	 --c-text-secondary: #A0AEC0;
 35	 /* 这是实现发光边框的关键，完全符合你的截图要求 */
 36	 --c-border: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.15);
 37	 --c-highlight-bg: rgba(79, 209, 197, 0.1);
 38	 --c-card-shadow: 0 4px 8px -1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
 39	 --c-card-hover-shadow: 0 10px 20px -3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4);
 40	}
 41	
 42	/* 2. 基础和布局样式 */
 43	.about-page-container {
 44	 background-color: var(--c-background);
 45	 color: var(--c-text-primary);
 46	 font-family: 'Inter', 'Helvetica Neue', 'Arial', sans-serif;
 47	 transition: background-color 0.4s var(--ease-out), color 0.4s var(--ease-out);
 48	 min-height: 100vh;
 49	}
 50	
 51	/* 覆盖 Tailwind 的 container 默认 padding */
 52	.about-page-container .container {
 53	 padding-left: 1.5rem;
 54	 padding-right: 1.5rem;
 55	}
 56	
 57	/* 3. 英雄区域 (Header) */
 58	.about-page-container .hero-gradient {
 59	 padding: 6rem 1rem;
 60	 text-align: center;
 61	 position: relative;
 62	 overflow: hidden;
 63	 background-color: var(--c-surface);
 64	 border-bottom: 1px solid var(--c-border);
 65	 transition: background-color 0.4s var(--ease-out), border-color 0.4s var(--ease-out);
 66	}
 67	.about-page-container .hero-gradient::before {
 68	 content: '';
 69	 position: absolute;
 70	 top: 0; left: 0; right: 0; bottom: 0;
 71	 background: radial-gradient(circle at 10% 20%, var(--c-highlight-bg) 0%, transparent 40%),
 72	 radial-gradient(circle at 90% 80%, var(--c-highlight-bg) 0%, transparent 40%);
 73	 opacity: 0.7;
 74	 animation: pulse 10s infinite alternate ease-in-out;
 75	 z-index: 1;
 76	 transition: background 0.4s var(--ease-out);
 77	}
 78	@keyframes pulse {
 79	 from { transform: scale(1); opacity: 0.6; }
 80	 to { transform: scale(1.2); opacity: 0.8; }
 81	}
 82	
 83	/* 4. 标题和文本样式 */
 84	.about-page-container h1,
 85	.about-page-container h2,
 86	.about-page-container h3 {
 87	 color: var(--c-text-primary);
 88	 font-weight: 700;
 89	 transition: color 0.4s var(--ease-out);
 90	}
 91	.about-page-container h1 {
 92	 font-size: clamp(2.5rem, 5vw, 3.5rem);
 93	 font-weight: 800;
 94	 letter-spacing: -0.025em;
 95	}
 96	.about-page-container h2 {
 97	 font-size: 2.25rem;
 98	 position: relative;
 99	 display: inline-block;
 100	}
 101	.about-page-container h2::after {
 102	 content: '';
 103	 position: absolute;
 104	 left: 50%;
 105	 transform: translateX(-50%);
 106	 bottom: -0.75rem;
 107	 width: 60px;
 108	 height: 4px;
 109	 background: linear-gradient(90deg, var(--c-primary), var(--c-secondary));
 110	 border-radius: 2px;
 111	 transition: background 0.4s var(--ease-out);
 112	}
 113	.about-page-container p {
 114	 color: var(--c-text-secondary);
 115	 line-height: 1.7;
 116	 transition: color 0.4s var(--ease-out);
 117	}
 118	
 119	/* 5. 卡片样式 (核心美化部分) */
 120	.about-page-container .bg-white,
 121	.about-page-container .feature-card,
 122	.about-page-container .tech-card,
 123	.about-page-container .cta-card {
 124	 background-color: var(--c-surface);
 125	 border: 1px solid var(--c-border);
 126	 border-radius: 1rem; /* 统一圆角 */
 127	 padding: 2rem;
 128	 box-shadow: var(--c-card-shadow);
 129	 transition: transform 0.3s var(--ease-out), box-shadow 0.3s var(--ease-out), border-color 0.3s var(--ease-out), background-color 0.4s var(--ease-out);
 130	 position: relative;
 131	 overflow: hidden;
 132	}
 133	
 134	.about-page-container .bg-white:hover,
 135	.about-page-container .feature-card:hover,
 136	.about-page-container .tech-card:hover,
 137	.about-page-container .cta-card:hover {
 138	 transform: translateY(-8px);
 139	 box-shadow: var(--c-card-hover-shadow);
 140	 border-color: var(--c-primary);
 141	}
 142	
 143	/* 愿景卡片文本对齐 */
 144	.about-page-container .bg-white p {
 145	 max-width: 75ch; /* 限制行宽，提高可读性 */
 146	 margin-left: auto;
 147	 margin-right: auto;
 148	}
 149	.about-page-container .bg-white strong {
 150	 color: var(--c-primary);
 151	 font-weight: 600;
 152	 transition: color 0.4s var(--ease-out);
 153	}
 154	
 155	/* 6. 图标样式 */
 156	.about-page-container .icon-wrapper {
 157	 display: inline-flex;
 158	 align-items: center;
 159	 justify-content: center;
 160	 border-radius: 1.25rem;
 161	 background: var(--c-highlight-bg);
 162	 color: var(--c-primary);
 163	 transition: all 0.3s var(--ease-out);
 164	}
 165	/* 悬停时图标的父级元素，让图标动起来 */
 166	.about-page-container .feature-card:hover .icon-wrapper,
 167	.about-page-container .cta-card:hover .icon-wrapper {
 168	 transform: scale(1.1) rotate(5deg);
 169	 background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--c-primary), var(--c-secondary));
 170	 color: white;
 171	}
 172	
 173	/* 7. 特定组件样式 */
 174	
 175	/* 开发者卡片内的特性列表 */
 176	.about-page-container .flex.items-center.gap-4 {
 177	 padding: 0.75rem;

 185	/* 技术栈卡片 */

 194	.about-page-container .cta-card h3,

 197	}

 200	}

 202	
 203	/* 8. 覆盖/协调 Tailwind 类，确保主题生效 */
 204	.about-page-container .dark\\:text-white,
